text: Gao Fengwen (; 23 November 1939 - 27 October 2020) was a Chinese football coach and a former international football player. He was born in Kaiyuan, Liaoning. From 1957 to 1973, he played for Liaoning FC. From 1965 to 1973, he played with the national team. He also managed the national team between 1986 to 1990. Gao died on 27 October 2020 in Beijing, aged 80.前中国国家队主教练高丰文去世 ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at sodasoccer.com Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Football managers Category:Chinese footballers
title: Gao Fengwen
